winners.tagline: AI can feel cold, distant, and choppy. PsycheView scans and reads your facial expressions and emotions, while you provide a summary of how you've been feeling. Games are also embedded to engage.

description_sections.heading: Inspiration
description_sections.content: The inspiration for Ember stems from a fundamental challenge in psychology and mental healthcare: the difficulty of objectively measuring a patient's emotional state. Clinicians and researchers often rely on subjective self-reporting and behavioral observation, which can be inconsistent and hard to quantify. As a psychology major, I saw an opportunity to bridge this gap by leveraging the power of multimodal AI. The Google Gemini Hackathon was the perfect catalyst to explore how advanced AI could be used to create a tool that provides clinicians with a "lens" into the human psyche, capturing the subtle, unspoken data of emotion and transforming it into clear, actionable insights for therapy and research.

description_sections.heading: What it does
description_sections.content: Ember is a sophisticated, AI-powered clinical insights platform designed for psychology professionals. It runs entirely in the browser and requires no backend, ensuring user privacy. Its core features include:

winners.tagline: Make your notes to the point and easy to read!

description_sections.heading: Inspiration
description_sections.content: I wanted notes that were succinct for my classes so that I could take notes fast in class without worrying about organization yet.

description_sections.heading: What it does
description_sections.content: It converts long notes into shorter cliff notes with options for vocabulary highlighting.

description_sections.heading: How we built it
description_sections.content: I used Gemini to code the basics and the details.

description_sections.heading: Challenges we ran into
description_sections.content: The highlighting and paragraph organization kept not working in particular, there were problems with the vocabulary, and the UI looked pretty basic.

description_sections.heading: What we learned
description_sections.content: Gemini is really fast; I was able to get this done today.

description_sections.heading: What's next for Shorthand Cliff Notes Converter
description_sections.content: I might go back and add new features.
